subject: Re: [LH] 60's love kitten Jane Birkin
body:
Oooooh....

I knew she had an album out and read an interview in something like Q
or Word.....but she didn't mention MSFC at all....hmmmm.......was
teetering on buying it, but the clips on the website make it a far
more enticing proposition....

Thanks for that.

Will
(Wondering why he top posted and yet too tired to change it)


On 22/06/07, Ted C Jacobs (tjacobs@Princeton.EDU)  wrote:
> http://www.janebirkin.net/uk/music.html
>
> Pardon moi if this is old news. I ran across Jane's site because I love her version of Home on her 2006 release "Fictions". I was surprised to find she covers MSFC on track 11.
> A very impressive release altogether, from one sexy senior citizen :-D
>
>
>
